definition: A tutorial topic is an organizational device that helps to keep tutorial step nodes arranged in a logical hierarchy by topics and subtopics.

paragraphs.text: Tutorial topics may be nested within other tutorial topics in unlimited levels, and each level may feature multiple tutorial steps.
To add the tutorial topic node, select Add Tutorial Topic on the parent node menu.
The configuration of the tutorial topic node is the same as the tutorial node. Refer to the latter, please.
